```{r}
library(agricolae)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
dataFolder<-"E:/#Journal_paper_prpn/Crop_yield/Yield_data/"
ta.stb14 = read_csv(paste0(dataFolder, "TA-B-2yr.csv"))
```
```{r}
aov1<-aov(StB14~rep+treat+rep*treat, data=ta.stb14)
summary(aov1)
```
```{r}
out <- HSD.test(aov1,"treat", group=TRUE,console=TRUE,
main="Straw B with different treat")
#stargraph
# Variation range: max and min
plot(out)
#endgraph
```


```{r}
# compare pair of treatment means
out<-HSD.test(aov1,"treat", group=FALSE)
print(out$comparison)
```
